name: The Fear
synopsis: Enix's second PS2 full-motion video title known as The Fear (the first was the slightly better received [[0 Story]]) is a horror adventure game in which players assume the role of a cameraman who must guide a group of actresses out of a mansion where something has gone horribly wrong. Gameplay is reliant on both puzzle solving and NPC character interaction with more than 1200 clips of FMV.
